list-item.p: Initial diagnosis of TNBC (date of diagnosis, histological characteristics of the tumor, hormone receptor and HER2 expression, TNM classification)
Cancer treatment and response to the treatment
Clinical characteristics of the tumor in the surgical specimen
Blood test results at the time of diagnosis, before surgery, before the onset of RT, and 6 months post-RT
TIL amount in the biopsy and in the surgical specimen
